ferrocarrilesDeAmericaDelSur.railways

Class Railway

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • ferrocarrilesDeAmericaDelSur.railways.Railway
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bolivia, Peru

    public abstract class Railway
extends java.lang.Thread
    Defines a basic railway system, for two railways with a shared single track pass.

      • choochoo

        public void choochoo()
              throws ProgrammingError
        Travel round the safe part of the railway (outside the pass).
        Throws:
        ProgrammingError - if the train is not currently at the end of the pass (and therefore at the start of the safe part of the railway).

      • crossPass

        public void crossPass()
               throws RailwaySystemError
        Cross the pass.
        Throws:
        SafetyViolationError - if there is/are already train(s) on the pass.
        RailwaySystemError

      • run

        Run the railway.
        Specified by:

      • runTrain

        public abstract void runTrain()
                       throws RailwaySystemError,
                              RailwaySystemError
        Each railway should independently define how the trains are to be run, using the basket(s). to maintain safety on the pass.
        Throws:
        RailwaySystemError - if a safety violation occurs while the railway is being run.

      • setErrorFlag

        public static void setErrorFlag(boolean errorFlag)
        Set the shared error flag (if an error occurs).
        Parameters:
        errorFlag - is true iff an error has occured.

      • errorOccurred

        public static boolean errorOccurred()
        Check the current error status.
        Returns:
        true iff an error is currently active.
